>
[Leshy Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=312) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 133 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[leaf order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You gain a leshy familiar, a Tiny plant (or fungus for a fungus leshy) that embodies one of the many spirits of nature. Other than taking the form of a plant instead of an animal, this familiar uses all the same rules as other familiars, which are detailed [here](/familiar-abilities).
name: Leshy Familiar
